span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用來為傳回型別方法這類。 is used as the return type for methods such as . 它並不適用於應用程式定義的集合，您應該使用更泛型的類別例如。It is not intended to be used for application-defined collections, for which you should use a more generic class such as .
